1744919.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Constellar" card or 1 "tellarknight" or "tellarnova" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Constellar" and "tellarknight" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Satellerknight Constellar Cassiopeia" once per turn. Once per Chain, during your opponent's turn, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster, using "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monsters you control as material, including this card.
1744919.name: Satellerknight Constellar Cassiopeia

1744396.effect:
Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can take 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" card from your GY, except "Constellarknight", and either add it to your hand or attach it to a "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster you control as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Constellarknight" once per turn.
● If a monster(s) is Summoned You can reveal your hand; add 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your Deck to your hand, with a different name from all cards in your hand, face-up field, and GY. 
● If this face-up card leaves the field: You can place 1 Continuous Spell/Trap from your hand face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.
1744396.name: Constellarknight

1744619.effect:
When you activate this card, you can also discard 1 card; apply 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 "Constellar", "tellarknight", or "tellarnova" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Constellarknight Constellation", or, if you discarded a card when you activated this card, you can add 2 cards with different names, instead.
● Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your hand, or, if you discarded a card when you activated this card, you can Special Summon 2 monsters, instead.
You can only activate 1 "Constellarknight Constellation" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate this card, except "Constellar" and "tellarknight" monsters.
1744619.name: Constellarknight Constellation

1744401.effect: During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your GY in Defense Position. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, by using 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster you control as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 card on the field or in the GYs; either return it to the hand or shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Constellarnova" once per turn.
1744401.name: Constellarnova

1763955.effect: You can banish the top card of your Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand, then, if you banished a "Spacial D" card to activate this effect, lose 1000 LP, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Spacial D" monster from your Deck, but its effects are negated. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Spacial D" monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate this effect, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use this effect of "Spacial Defender Grebro" once per turn.
1763955.name: Spacial Demon Grebro

1763960.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Spacial D" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished: You can shuffle 2 banished "Spacial D" cards into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Griron" once per turn.
1763960.name: Spacial Demon Griron

1763970.effect: If this card is banished by the effect of a "Spacial D" card: You can Special Summon this card. You can banish 1 card from your hand, field, or GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, this card loses 500 ATK. When this card leaves the field: You can add 1 "Spacial Dream" from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Drabras" once per turn.
1763970.name: Spacial Demon Drabras

1763966.effect: You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your hand, field, or GY, then target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn, and if you do, this card loses 500 ATK. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Dreqirm" once per turn.
1763966.name: Spacial Demon Dreqirm

1763965.effect: If this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card. You can banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your hand, field, or GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it, and if you do, this card loses 500 ATK. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Idusa" once per turn.
1763965.name: Spacial Demon Idusa

1763971.effect: You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, then, if you banished a "Spacial D" card(s) activate this effect, you can add 1 of them to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your hand or GY. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Mietyr" once per turn.
1763971.name: Spacial Demon Mietyr

1763975.effect: If a "Spacial D" monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, while this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card from your hand, field, or GY, then target 1 card in either GY; banish it, and if you do, this card loses 500 ATK. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Spacial D" monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate this effect, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Udyl" once per turn.
1763975.name: Spacial Demon Udly

1763978.effect: You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand. If the effect of a "Spacial D" monster is activated: You can banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your Deck, and if you do, this card loses 500 ATK. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D" monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Spacial Demon Vriodorm" once per turn. An Xyz Monster with this card as material gains the following effect.●Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your hand, then draw 1 card.
1763978.name: Spacial Demon Vriodorm

1763985.effect: All "Spacial D" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK. During the End Phase: You can add 1 of your banished "Spacial D" Spells/Traps to your hand. If a monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can banish 1 "Spacial D" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY instead. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Divide" once per turn.
1763985.name: Spacial Divide

1763987.effect: If this card is activated: You can banish 1 card from your hand or GY. If a "Spacial D" monster(s) is banished: You can add 1 of your banished "Spacial D" monsters to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Door #1" once per turn.
1763987.name: Spacial Door 1

1763981.effect: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Spacial D" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Spacial Dream". When a "Spacial D" monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; its effects are negated until the end of this turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Dream" once per turn.
1763981.name: Spacial Dream

1763998.effect: 2 Level 9 "Spacial Demon" monstersGains 300 ATK for each "Spacial D" card on the field. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 2 of your banished "Spacial D" monsters; until the end of this turn, this card gains ATK equal to half the ATK of 1 of those monsters, and if it does, shuffle those targets into the Deck, also other monsters you control cannot declare an attack this turn. If a "Spacial D" monster you control would be sent to the GY, you can banish it instead. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Dratior" once per turn.
1763998.name: Spacial Demon Dratior

1763996.effect: 2 Level 9 "Spacial D" monstersYou can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 of your banished "Spacial Demon" monsters; add it to your hand, then banish 1 "Spacial D" monster from your Deck with a different name. If a "Spacial D" card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your GY instead. You can target 1 banished card; attach it to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Krorion" once per turn.
1763996.name: Spacial Demon Krorion

1764001.effect: 4 Level 12 monstersYou can also Xyz Summon this card by using 2 "Spacial D" Xyz Monsters you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Cannot be targeted by card effects. During your Main Phase: You can detach 1 material from this card, and if you do, banish 1 "Spacial D card from your Deck. When a "Delta D" card(s) you control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Spacial D" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Disastrous Spacial Demon Galaxus" once per turn.
1764001.name: Disastorous Spacial Demon Galaxus

1764004.effect: 1 "Spacial D" monsterIf this card is Link Summoned: Banish 1 "Spacial D" card from your Deck. If a "Spacial D" card would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your field or GY instead. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Loudro" once per turn.
1764004.name: Spacial Demon Loudro

1764007.effect: 2 "Spacial D" monstersYou can target 1 card you control or in your GY, then target 1 card on the field; banish the first target, and if you do, destroy the other target. "Spacial D" monsters this card points to gain 500 ATK. If a "Spacial D" Xyz Monster is Xyz Summoned to a zone this card points to: You can banish 1 card from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you use either of these effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of "Spacial Demon Yoberus" once per turn.
1764007.name: Spacial Demon Yoberus

1764009.effect: 2+ "Spacial D" monsters including a "Spacial Demon" monsterIf you would banish a card(s) you control to activate the effect of a "Spacial D" monster, or would banish a card(s) you control by the effect of a "Spacial D" monster, you can also banish your opponent's monster(s) this card points to, even though you do not control them. If a monster(s) this card points to is banished: You can Special Summon 1 banished monster, except 1 of those banished monsters. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you use either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. You can only use each effect of the preceding effects of "Disastrous Spacial Demon Vraofro" once per turn. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: Banish the top card of your Deck.
1764009.name: Disastorous Spacial Demon Vraofro

1116627.effect: If you control a "Mythical Winged Beast" monster, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Icarus": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is added from your GY to your hand: You can target 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Icarus" once per turn.
1116627.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Icarus

1116582.effect: If you control a "Mythical Winged Beast" monster, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Pegasus": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is added from your GY to your hand: You can add 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Pegasus" once per turn.
1116582.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Pegasus

1116626.effect: If you control a "Mythical Winged Beast" monster, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Roc": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is added from your GY to your hand: You can add 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Roc" once per turn.
1116626.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Roc

1116628.effect: If you control a "Mythical Winged Beast" monster, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Wyvern": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is added from your GY to your hand: You can send 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Wyvern" once per turn.
1116628.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Wyvern

1116704.effect: Activate 1 of the following effects.● Special Summon 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster from your hand.● Target 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.You can only activate 1 "Mythical Winged Beast Blast" per turn.
1116704.name: Mythical Winged Beast Blast

1116671.effect: If you control no monsters: You can activate 1 of the following effects;● Special Summon 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster from your hand● Add 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster from your GY to your hand.You can discard 1 card, then target 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 effect of "Mythical Winged Beast Haven" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1116671.name: Mythical Winged Beast Haven

1116697.effect: If you control a WIND Winged-Beast monster: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If you control a "Mythical Winged Beast" monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, you can target 2 cards with this effect instead. You can only activate 1 "Mythical Winged Beast Assault" per turn.
1116697.name: Mythical Winged Beast Assault

1116700.effect: If your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect, while you control a WIND Winged-Beast monster: You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only activate 1 "Mythical Winged Beast Hurricane" per turn.
1116700.name: Mythical Winged Beast Hurricane

1119645.effect: 2 Level 3 "Mythical Winged Beast" monstersYou can detach 1 material from this card and discard 1 card; Set 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" Trap Card from your Deck. If this card is destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect: You can target 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster in your GY, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Basilisk"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Basilisk" once per turn.
1119645.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Basilisk

1116676.effect: 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Harpie"If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Mythical Winged Beast" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Harpie" once per turn.
1116676.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Harpie

1116632.effect: 2 "Mythical Winged Beast" monsters, except "Mythical Winged Beast - Phoenix"If this card is Link Summoned: You can discard 1 card, then target up to 2 "Mythical Winged Beast" monsters in your GY; Special Summon them to zones this card points to. You cannot Link Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Mythical Winged Beast" monsters. If an Xyz Monster this card points to detaches a material(s) to activate its effect: You can target that detached material in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mythical Winged Beast - Phoenix" once per turn.
1116632.name: Mythical Winged Beast - Phoenix
